quotes.quote: One cannot seize, and capture one's love, to impose its will.
Eyes can only capture objects that already seen in mind. And mind can only see things that already written in heart.
The mind doesn’t carry anything on its own, but it captures everything from outside, and stretches them into different experience, impressions or dreams of a person.
Capture the moment. It is your only sacred-memory.
You must capture and keep the heart of the original and supremely able man before his brain can do its best.
Creating value isn't enough - you also need to capture some of the value you create.
Capturing the moments of today that will wow your hearts tomorrow.
Any moment which is not captured is lost in the events of time.
Capture your youth, while you can.
Things have to be believable, not in a literal, photographic sense, but in an emotional sense - capturing the essence of the situation.
The power of the writer is to capture the thoughts live and present them as they appeared in his mind.
